RumorFact.Text: A group of Nomai late for the test of the Deep Storm Station hurried back to the Sun Station to find a projection stone to the Deep Storm Station.
A projection stone to the Deep Storm Station was left somewhere on the Sun Station's catwalk.

ExploreFact.Text: The Deep Storm Station was unable to locate the Eye of the Universe.
Though it failed to find the Eye, the test confirmed that the Ash Twin Project was theoretically sound, giving the Nomai confidence to use the Sun Station without fear.
